name: gulp-exercises
description: An NPM script to install all the workshop dependencies

scripts.deps:
echo '\033[0;32m Installing All Exercise dependencies 

 This will take a while 

 go grab a coffee\033[0m' && find . -maxdepth 1 -type d -exec sh -c '(cd {} && echo " 
***
 \033[0;32mNow installing\033[0m {}
***" && npm install --silent)' ';' && echo '


Success!


'
